Class TUI

java.lang.Object
mygame.terminal.TUI
public final class TUI extends Object
Utility class for static methods that use ANSI escape sequences to create a TUI.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    TUI.Color
    ANSI escape codes for colors.

      public static String colorize(String str, TUI.Color.Background background, TUI.Color.Foreground foreground)
      Gives a string color when printed to the console.

      Sets background and foreground colors.

      Parameters:
      str - a string
      background - background color
      foreground - foreground color
      Returns:
      a colored string

    • colorize

      public static String colorize(String str, TUI.Color.Background background)
      Gives a string color when printed to the console.

      Sets the background color, leaves the foreground color default.

      Parameters:
      str - a string
      background - background color
      Returns:
      a colored string

    • colorize

      public static String colorize(String str, TUI.Color.Foreground foreground)
      Gives a string color when printed to the console.

      Sets the foreground color, leaves the background color default.

      Parameters:
      str - a string
      foreground - foreground color
      Returns:
      a colored string
